The point $ (-3, 2)$ is rotated $ 90^\circ$ clockwise around the origin to point $ B$. Point $ B$ is then reflected over the line $ y = x$ to point $ C$. What are the coordinates of $ C$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ ( - 3, - 2)\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ ( - 2, - 3)\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ (2, - 3)\qquad \textbf{(D)}\ (2,3)\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ (3,2)$
